org.apache.hadoop.fs.viewfs

Class InodeTree<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.viewfs.InodeTree<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - is AbstractFileSystem or FileSystem The three main methods are #InodeTreel(Configuration) // constructor InodeTree(Configuration, String) // constructor resolve(String, boolean)

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Unstable
abstract class InodeTree<T>
extends Object
    InodeTree implements a mount-table as a tree of inodes. It is used to implement ViewFs and ViewFileSystem. In order to use it the caller must subclass it and implement the abstract methods getTargetFileSystem(INodeDir), etc. The mountable is initialized from the config variables as specified in ViewFs

      In internal class to represent a mount link A mount link can be single dir link or a merge dir link.

        Parameters:

        viewName - - the name of the mount table - if null use defaultMT name
